title: Pittsburgh Zoo receives largest-ever gift, $9 million
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Local - Today 
The Richard King Mellon Foundation has awarded a $9 million grant to the Pittsburgh Zoo & PPG Aquarium -- the single largest grant in the zo...
